subject: Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Football
Brain
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Researchers at U.C.L.A. have been developing a biomarker that aims to identify tau protein deposits in the brain, a signature of C.T.E., when patients are given a PET scan.
snippet: Researchers at U.C.L.A. have been developing a biomarker that aims to identify tau protein deposits in the brain, a signature of C.T.E., when patients are given a PET scan.
